Description: On US-17 North in the County of Stafford, in the vicinity of Hartwood Church Rd; Rt. 705N/S (Stafford County), motorists can expect delays due to an incident. Lane closures exist.

Description: On VA-64 in the County of Pulaski, in the vicinity of Lee Hwy; US-11N/S, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 176.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
